data.name: Eddie Bauer Yellow Yarn Dyed Checkered Cotton Fabric
data.description:
Elevate Your Home Decor with Eddie Bauer Yellow Yarn Dyed Checkered Cotton Fabric

Bring a touch of sunshine into your home with the Eddie Bauer Yellow Yarn Dyed Checkered Cotton Fabric. This versatile fabric is perfect for creating stunning curtains, tablecloths, and more. Made with 100% cotton, it offers a soft and comfortable feel that is perfect for any room in your home.

The checkered pattern in yellow adds a cheerful and playful vibe to your decor. The yarn dyed technique ensures that the color stays vibrant and long lasting, even after multiple washes. With its easy care instructions, including machine wash normal cold and tumble dry low, you can enjoy your creations for years to come. Plus, the nonchlorine bleach and cool iron options make it easy to keep your fabric looking like new.

Product Details

  • Brand: Eddie Bauer
  • Width: 44 inches
  • Content: 100% Cotton
  • Care: Bleach, Tumble Dry Low, Cool Iron, Machine Wash No

With a width of 44 inches, this fabric is perfect for a variety of projects, from creating cozy blankets to crafting stylish dresses.
